CustomField.formula: (Delivery_Weight__c * case(Delivery_Customer_Rating__c,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))+ (Quality_Weight__c * case(Quality_Customer_Rating__c ,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))+ (Reliability_Weight__c * case(Reliability_Customer_Rating__c ,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))+ (Responsiveness_Weight__c * case(Responsiveness_Customer_Rating__c ,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))+ (Value_Weight__c * case(Value_Customer_Rating__c ,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))+ (Service_Support_Weight__c * case(Service_Support_Customer_Rating__c ,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))+ (Development_Weight__c * case(Development_Customer_Rating__c ,"Green - Satisfied",90,"Blue - Best in Class",100, "Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied",67.5,"Red - Very Dissatisfied",40,"Unspecified",0,0))
CustomField.label: Overall Calculated Satisfaction Value
